name: backend
description: | Method        | Endpoint           | Body (required)                       | Body (optional) | Notes                                             | | ------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | | register POST | /api/auth/register | name, email, username, password, role | N/A             | Creates a new user object in the database.        | | login POST    | /api/auth/login    | username, password                    | N/A             | Returns a welcome message and the JSON Web Token. |
